name: 西德哈特·沙玛
name_full: 西德哈特·沙玛 Siddharth Sharma
introduction: Toronto-based actor Siddharth Sharma boasts over half a decade of experience and is represented by Noble Caplan Abrams. Known for his versatility and captivating performances, Siddharth has become a sought-after talent in the industry. Beyond acting, he co-founded HoldTheSauceFilms, a company dedicated to independent filmmaking, producing short films, music videos, and soon-to-be-released micro films. Siddharth's passion for storytelling and dedication to the art of cinema make him a rising star to watch in the entertainment world.
